text: Miguel Ángel Benito Díez (born 21 September 1993) is a Spanish former professional racing cyclist, who rode professionally for UCI Professional Continental team , between 2015 and 2018. ==Major results== ;2011 : 9th Road race, UEC European Junior Championships ;2013 : 8th Overall Vuelta Ciclista a León ;2017 : 8th Overall Colorado Classic ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:People from León, Spain
title: Miguel Ángel Benito
